entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6.
